title: MVP-1: events + highlights (shots/goals only, conservative)

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Infer shots/goals conservatively and export highlights suitable for selling value to tracked players.
Keep event semantics high precision; candidate/unknown allowed; never emit confirmed without a strict bar.
non_goals: Guaranteed highlights when ball is missing for long spans.
success_criteria: events.json contains conservative shot/goal candidates with evidence pointers into tracks.jsonl.
A highlight export path exists for candidate shots/goals (clip windows) and is deterministic.
report.html surfaces events/highlights and explains confidence and failure modes.

work_packages.title: Events
items: TASK-EVENTS-SHOTS-GOALS-MVP-001 Implement conservative shot/goal inference suitable for MVP.

work_packages.title: Highlights + reporting
items: TASK-HIGHLIGHTS-CLIPS-MVP-001 Export highlight clips for candidate shots/goals.
TASK-EVENTS-REPORTING-MVP-001 Surface events/highlights and confidence in report.html/report.json.
